hero.text: Discover why millions of users trust GeoPhone for their navigation needs

cards.paragraph: Works with any type of device, regardless of model or operating system.

cards.paragraph: Ready to use, with no complications or prior installation.

cards.title: Privacy guaranteed
cards.paragraph: Your information is always protected with full anonymity.

screenImg.title: Your location control center
screenImg.paragraph: With your active subscription, you can locate multiple devices from a single, easy-to-use interface.

testimonials.title: We have helped thousands of people around the world

people.title: Lost your phone?
people.paragraph: Enable the exact location of your phone with a single tap
people.name: Marie
people.story: ”I forgot my phone on the subway. QuickGeo allowed the person who found it to send me its location without unlocking it and I was able to recover it safely.”

people.title: Looking for a relative?
people.paragraph: Instantly show their precise position on a map
people.name: Darren and Julie
people.story: ”Simple and practical to locate our 12-year-old daughter when she goes out with her friends. All she has to do is click a link and we can be at ease.”

people.title: Suspicious of an online buyer or seller?
people.paragraph: Ask them to locate themselves before proceeding with the transaction
people.name: Mark
people.story: ”I was able to verify the whereabouts of a seller after paying a deposit for a scooter. Thanks to QuickGeo, our meeting was smooth and everything went well!”

howItWork.title: How does it work?

functions.title: Perform a search on a number
functions.paragraph: Our technology starts locating and identifying the associated phone.

functions.title: Request a precise location
functions.paragraph: We send a text message to the target phone to locate it. This message is anonymous by default but can be customized to increase chances of success.

functions.title: Get your results
functions.paragraph: You will be automatically informed with the address as soon as the recipient confirms their location.

howItWork.title2: Locate any phone today for just €0.50

proof.paragraph: Try our solution for an unlimited 24-hour period for just €0.50. At the end of your trial period, you can choose to remain subscribed for €47.90 per month.

questions.title: FAQs
questions.subtitle: Still have questions?
questions.paragraph: Our team is here to help, ask us anything.

accordion.title: Is it illegal to locate a third party?
accordion.paragraph: QuickGeo is completely legal and complies with CNIL recommendations. QuickGeo cannot work without third-party consent for geolocation.

accordion.title: What types of phones are compatible?
accordion.paragraph: QuickGeo works on all phones with internet connection.

accordion.title: How accurate is QuickGeo?
accordion.paragraph: Our service provides you with the exact location with an accuracy between 1 and 6 meters.

accordion.title: How long does it take?
accordion.paragraph: The third party will receive a text message within 2 minutes, and you will receive a notification immediately after the third party has given consent to be geolocated.

accordion2.title: Does QuickGeo work if the third party's phone is turned off?
accordion2.paragraph: The third party's phone must be turned on for tracking to work. However, as soon as it's turned on, geolocation messages will be received.

accordion2.title: How much does mobile phone geolocation cost?
accordion2.paragraph: The third party's phone must be turned on for tracking to work. However, as soon as it's turned on, geolocation messages will be received.

accordion2.title: Is my information secure?
accordion2.paragraph: Your anonymity is important to us. The third party's geographical location is sent through a secure TLS (Transport Layer Security) protocol and is not visible to others. Your personal information and identity are not shared with anyone.

accordion2.title: How can I cancel my subscription?
accordion2.paragraph: The subscription is without commitment and can be canceled at any time by clicking the button below and following the on-screen instructions.
